snippet: After missing out on the playoffs, General Manager Brian Cashman has already begun addressing the Yankees’ most urgent needs, beginning with an aggressive move to re-sign Manager Joe Girardi.
abstract: New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman has already begun addressing team's most urgent needs following failure to make playoffs, beginning with an aggressive move to re-sign manager Joe Girardi.
lead_paragraph: After missing out on the playoffs, General Manager Brian Cashman has already begun addressing the Yankees’ most urgent needs, beginning with an aggressive move to re-sign Manager Joe Girardi.

headline.main: Wasting No Time, Cashman Tries to Keep Girardi With the Yankees
headline.print_headline: Wasting No Time, Cashman Tries to Keep Girardi With the Yankees
